sentences.en: Cun is now a heartland of science and technology.
sentences.cn: 中关村是科技的中心地带.

sentences.en: In much of Christianity's former heartland, religion is associated with tradition and ritual.
sentences.cn: 在基督教的前中心地带, 宗教是与传统和仪式联系着的.

sentences.en: Karbala, south of Baghdad in Iraq's Shiite heartland, is one of the world's holiest Shiite cities.
sentences.cn: 卡尔巴拉, 伊拉克巴格达南部的什叶派圣地, 是世界上什叶派最神圣的城市之一.

sentences.en: Menghai Tea Factory is located in Xishuangbanna Dai Autonomous Prefecture aa . Fohai, the heartland of tea.
sentences.cn: 勐海茶厂坐落在世界茶树发源地——西双版纳傣族自治州勐海县(旧称佛海).

sentences.en: Now, there are lower urbanization level, feeblish heartland and lacking establishment in our urbanization construction.
sentences.cn: 目前, 我国城市化建设面临城市化水平偏低 、 中心城市偏弱、基础设施不足等问题.

sentences.en: the Democratic heartlands of the Deep South
sentences.cn: 民主党南部腹地的大本营

sentences.en: The R . A . F .'s bold bombing of Ruhr dams in 1943 spread destruction across Germany's industrial heartland.
sentences.cn: 英国皇家空军1943年轰炸鲁尔河大坝的大胆行动破坏了德国的工业中心.

sentences.en: The sight of youngsters speaking Chinese in the Mexican heartland is unusual , to say the least.
sentences.cn: 在墨西哥内陆腹地学汉语的青少年以前绝对少见.

sentences.en: We then headed west towards the heartland of Poland.
sentences.cn: 我们随后朝西前往波兰中部。

trans.tran_en: the central part of a country or area of land
